snippet: A criminal complaint against the jailed son of a Boston Red Sox broadcaster says he threw hot coffee in a fellow inmate's face, hit him with a plastic chair and punched him....

headline.print_headline: Broadcaster's Jailed Son Accused of Hitting Inmate
headline.main: Broadcaster's Jailed Son Accused of Hitting Inmate

lead_paragraph: A criminal complaint against the jailed son of a Boston Red Sox broadcaster says he threw hot coffee in a fellow inmate's face, hit him with a plastic chair and punched him.
